title: 014 - Jonnie W - Cankers, Pro Wrestlers and Fake Crows
description:
Wow, we're all over the map on this one. Jonnie has a canker sore, Tim laments his skin tags, and Caleb finds a bag full of beard in the medicine cabinet. Tim reminisces about the time he got a mouthful of mustard at La Petite Academy, and then Tim and Jonnie fall down the rabbit hole of Professional Wrestling.
 Also in this episode: Tim knocks himself unconscious at a prom alternative. Jonnie slides across the stage on his elbows. Caleb researches the legality of shooting a hawk. An MMA fighter winds up on our bus. And Jonnie Canker and Jimmy the Cyst part ways, citing creative differences.
 Holla at us: @poddybreak See this lunacy, live in your town: Get Tim Tickets!
 Get more of good ole Jonnie at http://jonniew.com/ Tweet him: @Jonnie_W
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Tim Hawkins
itunes:subtitle: You're just standing there, with your teeth in your mouth...
